attributes.action: Before setting Tax for others, the Chancellor  MUST publish his own tax status.
attributes.additional_details: Anyone dictating how much tax a Nation pays has a moral duty to state their own Tax Returns. No one inflicting tax hikes or Cuts can morally evade scrutiny.
attributes.background: The Chancellor(s) has increased taxes for the Self-Employed, and made massive Cuts to the poorest - We the People therefore, demand to know whether they themselves evade what is obligatory to us. Transparency is a precursor to trust.
